DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical research study assess effect Famotidine give twice daily Atazanavir administer Ritonavir HIV-Infected subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study Famotidine Atazanavir With Ritonavir HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected male female subject age 18 65 year old BMI 18 35 kg/m² Prior enrollment subject must currently receive Atazanavir/Ritonavir plus least 2 NRTIs , must plasma HIV RNA < 400 copies/mL CD4 count > 200 cells/mm³
